inclusion.criterion: Transient ischemic attack in recent 3 months
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Ischemic stroke including acute and old cerebral infarction
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Vessel stenosis or occlusion caused by trauma, dissection or Takayasu's arteritis
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Stroke patients caused by patent foramen ovale
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: 74M hx of CAD s/p CABG, EF 60% prior CVA (no residual deficits), HTN, HL, DMII, Moderate to Severe PVD was referred to cardiology for evaluation of PVD.
